attributes.action: Children under 16 year old need free Transport in Essex
attributes.additional_details: Children in Essex need free travel pass on BUSES and TRAINS. If children in London can get free pass why not in Essex, atlist they all get the same amaunt of Child Benefit. Children living in Essex are not getting more money than Children living in London.In Essex buses Children from age 5year old pays.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Essex County Council.
